channel.title: CVE Feed for College Management -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for College Management -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-39180|2024-08-03T12:00:42.481Z -- college%20management -- college%20management%20system%20v1.0
item.description: College Management System v1.0 - SQL Injection (SQLi). By inserting SQL commands to the username and password fields in the login.php page

item.title: CVE-2022-39179|2024-08-03T12:00:42.476Z -- college%20management -- college%20management%20system%20v1.0
item.description: College Management System v1.0 - Authenticated remote code execution. An admin user (the authentication can be bypassed using SQL Injection that mentioned in my other report) can upload .php file that contains malicious code via student.php file.
